dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
AutoDetectedBrowser: Google Chrome
AutoDetectedOS: Windows 7
IIILanguage: en
IssueType: lr_circumvention
Language: en
agree: checked
circumvention_additional_comments:
circumvention_injured: Hi,

I represent WWW.123RF.COM who has authorized me to act as on its behalf for  
copyright infringement notification.

Infringement(s) of WWW.123RF.COM image(s)  
http://www.123rf.com/photo_8687975_smashing-alarm-clock-with-hammer.html   
has been detected on the Website  
http://lesenfantperdus.blogspot.com/2011/03/time-is-on-my-side-oh-yes-it-is.html

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section  
512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the  
detected infringements.

Please be advised that by law, you must "expeditiously remove or disable  
access to" the infringing photograph(s) upon receiving this notice.   
Non-compliance may result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under  
the DMCA.

I have a good faith belief that use of the materials in the manner  
complained of herein is not authorized by WWW.123RF.COM, its licensing  
representatives, or the law.

The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge.  I  
hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf  
of 123RF.COM for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its  
exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

Please e-mail me at SUBMISSION@123RF.COM, a prompt response no later than 5  
business days from this notice is required indicating the actions you have  
taken to resolve this matter.

Best Regards,
Jaycee
123RF.com
circumvention_what_product: Image of the hand smashing the alarm clock  
(bottom of the page)

http://www.123rf.com/photo_8687975_smashing-alarm-clock-with-hammer.html
